a.title:
PUBLIC NOTICE 
TIME CHANGE AND VIRTUAL MEETING INFORMATION
4/29/20 REGULAR PUBLIC MEETING/BUDGET HEARING         
TEANECK BOARD OF EDUCATION

UPDATED ZOOM INFO

In accordance with the Open Public Meetings Act, P.L. 1975 c 231 and the Governor of New Jersey’s Executive Orders 102 and 104 regarding COVID 19 Emergency Actions, this is to advise that the Teaneck Board of Education will hold its regularly scheduled Regular Public meeting/Budget Hearing on Wednesday, April 29, 2020 now to be held Virtually to begin at 7:00pm. Formal action may be taken.


The meeting will take place virtually. Please click on the link below to join.

When: April 29, 2020 07:00 PM Eastern Time (US and Canada)
Topic: Teaneck Board of Education Regular Public Meeting/Budget Hearing – April 29,  2020 - 7:00PM

Please click the link below to join the webinar:
https://zoom.us/j/488588817

Or iPhone one-tap :
   US: +16465588656,,488588817#  or +13126266799,,488588817#
Or Telephone:
   Dial(for higher quality, dial a number based on your current location):
       US: +1 646 558 8656  or +1 312 626 6799  or +1 669 900 9128  or +1 253 215 8782  or +1 301 715 8592  or +1 346 248 7799
   Webinar ID: 488 588 817
   International numbers available: https://zoom.us/u/aczpRRupuq


Public comment can only be made if you attend the meeting via the Zoom app. Instructions on how to download the Zoom app can be found on the district website at
www.teaneckschools.org


Sincerely,
Melissa Simmons
Business Administrator/Board Secretary
Location: Teaneck High School - Cranford Gym - Virtual Meeting Starting at: 7:00 PM
